modName: Ultra Rad Fish Upgrade Critters Keelhaul Edition Deluxe
summary: Makes the Critters such as Butterfly,Dragonfly, Fish:Pond & Salmon Can now Only be caught with selective items not by hand .All critters can move higher farther and will be many more now MANY MORE !
descriptionHtml:
Makes the Critters such as Butterfly,Dragonfly, Fish:Pond & Salmon Can now Only be caught with selective items not by hand .All critters can move higher farther and will be many more now MANY MORE !

Fish will need a second mod (http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16139/?)(Fishing In Skyrim) to catch fish and i will in time modify it to (IF POSSIBLE) Have animated fishing pole and animation
as of now fish cannot be harvested by hand (per version 0.1 beta as of 1/27/2014 of U.R.F.U.C.K.E.D)

Bee's will sting you now on collision(WIP per version 0.1 beta as of 1/27/2014 of U.R.F.U.C.K.E.D)
Fish will Flee from player (WIP per version 0.1 beta as of 1/27/2014 of U.R.F.U.C.K.E.D)
Small Spiders Will be added as critters (WIPper version 0.1 beta as of 1/27/2014 of U.R.F.U.C.K.E.D)

Might need to make the fish a animated animal like slaughter fish to have the flee effect work as they will need a AI unless i find a work around inside the critter system (per version 0.1 beta as of 1/27/2014 of U.R.F.U.C.K.E.D)

Hope to add more compatiblity for mods such as (Ants in my pants,Skybirds,Fishing in skyrim,drivable boats,83Willows 101Bugs.
Hope to make bee swarm if hit there nest
author: Hollow_Fang
